title: Ticket #3716: condor_q -bet self-inconsistent
description:
The Requirements expression for your job reduces to these conditions:

Step    Matched  Condition
-----  --------  ---------
[1]         132  TARGET.Arch == "X86_64"
[3]           1  ifThenElse(OpSys == "WINDOWS",OpSysShortName == "Debian7" || OpSysName == "Debian7",OpSysAndVer == "Debian7")

Suggestions:

1   ifThenElse(OpSys == "WINDOWS",OpSysShortName == "Debian7" || OpSysName == "Debian7",OpSysAndVer == "Debian7")                                      0                   REMOVE

The analysis of a clause and the suggestion regarding it should probably both think that one slot (machine) matched.
